verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> u-che-chal-Lot Now when all this was finished כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise יָצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U went out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El all Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֮ <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-tze-'Im that were present לְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> le-'a-Rei to the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וַיְשַׁבְּר֣וּ <S%H7665><s%> vay-shab-be-Ru in pieces הַמַּצֵּב֣וֹת <S%H4676><s%> ham-matz-tze-Vot the images וַיְגַדְּע֣וּ <S%H1438><s%> vay-gad-de-'U and cut down הָאֲשֵׁרִ֡ים <S%H842><s%> ha-'a-she-Rim the groves וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <S%H5422><s%> vay-nat-te-Tzu and threw down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֠בָּמוֹת <S%H1116><s%> Hab-ba-mot the high places וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֞ת <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-be-Chot and the altars מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all יְהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah out of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֛ן <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min and Benjamin וּבְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> u-ve-'ef-Ra-yim in Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> u-me-nash-Sheh also and Manasseh עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until לְכַלֵּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> le-chal-Leh; until they had utterly destroyed וַיָּשׁ֜וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu returned כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei them all Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לַאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <S%H272><s%> la-'a-chuz-za-To to his possession לְעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5892><s%> le-'a-rei-Hem. into their own cities ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Med appointed יְחִזְקִיָּ֡הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu and Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַחְלְק֣וֹת <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-Kot the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> Ve-hal-vi-yim and the Levites עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֞ם <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-ko-Tam after their courses אִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man כְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> ke-Fi according עֲבֹדָת֗וֹ <S%H5656><s%> a-vo-da-To, to his service לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-lal-vi-Yim, and Levites לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah for burnt offerings וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> ve-lish-la-Mim; and for peace offerings לְשָׁרֵת֙ <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-Ret to minister וּלְהֹד֣וֹת <S%H3034><s%> u-le-ho-Dot and to give thanks וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <S%H1984><s%> u-le-hal-Lel, and to praise בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <S%H8179><s%> be-sha-'a-Rei in the gates מַחֲנ֥וֹת <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Not of the tents יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

וּמְנָת֩ <S%H4521><s%> u-me-Nat portion הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech [He appointed] also the king's מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at רְכוּשׁ֜וֹ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sho of his substance לָעֹל֗וֹת <S%H5930><s%> la-'o-Lot, for the burnt offerings לְעֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-lOt burnt offerings הַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker [to wit] for the morning וְהָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ve-ha-'E-rev, and evening וְהָ֣עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> ve-Ha-'o-Lot, and the burnt offerings לַשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <S%H7676><s%> lash-shab-ba-Tot for the sabbaths וְלֶחֳדָשִׁ֣ים <S%H2320><s%> ve-le-cho-da-Shim and for the new moons וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <S%H4150><s%> ve-lam-mo-'a-Dim; and for the set feasts כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> kak-ka-Tuv as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Moreover he commanded לָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am the people לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> le-yo-she-Vei that dwelt יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, in Jerusalem לָתֵ֕ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give מְנָ֥ת <S%H4521><s%> me-Nat the portion הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim; and the Levites לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an might יֶחֶזְק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> ye-chez-Ku that they might be encouraged בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְכִפְרֹ֣ץ <S%H6555><s%> ve-chif-Rotz came abroad הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, And as soon as the commandment הִרְבּ֤וּ <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bu in abundance בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit the firstfruits דָּגָ֗ן <S%H1715><s%> da-Gan, of corn תִּיר֤וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> ti-Roosh wine וְיִצְהָר֙ <S%H3323><s%> ve-yitz-Har and oil וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash, and honey וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'At and of all the increase שָׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> sa-Deh; of the field וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <S%H4643><s%> u-ma'-Sar and the tithe הַכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol of all לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro they in abundantly הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u. brought

וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And [concerning] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֮ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, in מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> ma'-Sar the tithe בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar of oxen וָצֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> va-Tzon, and sheep וּמַעְשַׂ֣ר <S%H4643><s%> u-ma'-Sar and the tithe קָֽדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim, of holy things הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H6942><s%> ham-kud-da-Shim which were consecrated לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God הֵבִ֕יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u they also brought in וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu and laid עֲרֵמ֥וֹת <S%H6194><s%> a-re-Mot heaps עֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6194><s%> a-re-Mot. heaps ס sa-Mek

בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, In the third הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel-lu they began הָעֲרֵמ֖וֹת <S%H6194><s%> ha-'a-re-Mot of the heaps לְיִסּ֑וֹד <S%H3245><s%> le-yis-Sod; to lay the foundation וּבַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> u-va-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I [them] in the seventh כִּלּֽוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> kil-Lu. and finished ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> ve-has-sa-Rim, and the princes וַיִּרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֲרֵמ֑וֹת <S%H6194><s%> ha-'a-re-Mot; the heaps וַֽיְבָרֲכוּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> vay-va-ra-Chu they blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וַיִּדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> vai-yid-Rosh questioned יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim and the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning הָעֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6194><s%> ha-'a-re-Mot. concerning the heaps

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer answered אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about עֲזַרְיָ֧הוּ <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Ya-hu And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh the chief לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house צָד֑וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok; of Zadok וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer him and said מֵהָחֵ֨ל <S%H2490><s%> me-ha-Chel Since [the people] began הַתְּרוּמָ֜ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah the offerings לָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> la-Vi to bring בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אָכ֨וֹל <S%H398><s%> a-Chol to eat וְשָׂב֤וֹעַ <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Vo-a' we have had enough וְהוֹתֵר֙ <S%H3498><s%> ve-ho-Ter and have left עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- with לָר֔וֹב <S%H7230><s%> la-Rov, plenty כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD בֵּרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach hath blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, his people וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> ve-han-no-Tar and that which is left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶהָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon [is] this great store הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. and this ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer commanded יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah לְהָכִ֧ין <S%H3559><s%> le-ha-Chin to prepare לְשָׁכ֛וֹת <S%H3957><s%> le-sha-Chot chambers בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיָּכִֽינוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> vai-ya-Chi-nu. and they prepared

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u And brought in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתְּרוּמָ֧ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah the offerings וְהַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֛ר <S%H4643><s%> ve-ham-ma-'a-Ser and the tithes וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> ve-hak-ko-da-Shim and the dedicated בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-Nah; [things] faithfully וַעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei-Hem charge נָגִיד֙ <S%H5057><s%> na-Gid [was] ruler; כֹּונַנְיָהוּ ko-nan-ya-hu ככָּֽנַנְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3562><s%> ka-nan-Ya-hu Conaniah קהַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi, the Levite וְשִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> ve-shim-'I and Shimei אָחִ֖יהוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-hu his brother מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <S%H4932><s%> mish-Neh. [was] the next
